data.details:
Bug Out Bungalow- BJ
Grades: 2, 3, 4, 5

Are you ready to go on an engineering adventure? Explore new places with Flynn as she travels around the world lending a hand! Flynn needs your help solving problems as they pop up, and helping her get out of trouble by putting your engineering intuition to the test! On this adventure, Flynn is in need of a shelter to protect her from the menacing manta blanca bugs that have been biting her! She needs a shelter that will get her off of the ground and out of the rain. Can you help her design a shelter that Monkey can build to get her off the ground and away from the elements? Fun patch included.

*This event is for 2016 registered Girl Scouts, and registered & approved adult volunteers.
* For safety and supervision reasons, troops and individuals are not permitted to bring non-Girl Scouts or siblings. 
*Girl/adult ratios must be followed and adults are expected to stay on the premises during the event. 

$35/girl, $1/adult
Contact: Brittany McCallister 904.389.3071
